message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for $170. I think it's a great deal for the value it provides.
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I am only able to pay up to $150. I hope we can come to an agreement.
Hi Bob, thanks for your offer. I'm willing to come down a bit, how about $160?
Hello Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I would like to counter with an offer of $140 for the product. I hope this aligns better with your expectations.
Bob, I appreciate your negotiation, but I can't go as low as $140.  My final offer is $155. Let me know if that works for you.
